Record.Term: AV Block Second Degree Mobitz Type I
Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Respiratory and Thoracic Disorder/Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Heart Disorder/Arrhythmia/Heart Block/Atrioventricular Block/AV Block Second Degree/AV Block Second Degree Mobitz Type I
Record.BroaderTerm: AV Block Second Degree Mobitz Type I
Record.Synonym: AV Block Second Degree Mobitz Type I
Mobitz Type I Second Degree AV Block
Second Degree Atrioventricular Block Mobitz Type I
Record.Description: Intermittent failure of atrial electrical impulse conduction through the atrioventricular (AV) node to the ventricles, characterized by a progressively lengthening PR interval prior to the block of an atrial impulse.
